data.title: King Salman Caps Saudi Cabinet Overhaul With Finance Chief
data.meta_description: Saudi Arabia’s finance minister for two decades was replaced on Monday, capping a major overhaul that leaves key posts under the control of a new generation of bureaucrats close to Deputy Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman.
data.text:
Royal order excuses Al-Assaf, long-time finance minister

Former Capital Markets chief Mohammed Al-Jadaan his successor

Saudi Arabia’s finance minister for two decades was replaced on Monday, capping a major overhaul that leaves key posts under the control of a new generation of bureaucrats close to Deputy Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman.

QuickTake Saudi Arabia's Strains
